sentences.english: He was in such a hurry to get out that he barged into a passer-by.
sentences.chinese: 他急急忙忙地往外走，竟與一位行人撞了個滿懷。

sentences.english: When the air raid occurred,they hurried to the safety.
sentences.chinese: 空襲發生時，他們急忙跑到安全的地方。

sentences.english: The driver clapped on the brakes but failed to stop in time.
sentences.chinese: 司機急忙踩住剎車，但沒有及時把車停住。

sentences.english: The Gu way grows startled disgrace, body quickly the Zong jumped behind outside of circle.
sentences.chinese: 賈道長愕然失色，身子急忙後縱跳出了圈外。

sentences.english: She went post-haste to the bank and cashed the check .
sentences.chinese: 她急忙趕到銀行，把支票兌換成現金。

sentences.english: He ran behind the wall anxiously, but Peter was all right.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙跑到那堵牆後面，發現彼得安然無恙。

sentences.english: He clapped his hat on angrily and walked out.
sentences.chinese: 他氣沖沖地急忙戴上帽子走出去了。

sentences.english: Hearing the wheels on the drawbridge, Puss in Boots hastened out.
sentences.chinese: 聽見吊橋上車輪的聲音，穿靴子的貓急忙跑了出來。

sentences.english: They ducked down behind a wall as stones began to fly.
sentences.chinese: 他們在石塊飛過來時急忙俯身蹲到一堵牆後。

sentences.english: Big sister Jane follows to push the giant cliffs, hurriedly block.
sentences.chinese: 大妹見天貞要把擎天推下山崖，急忙阻止。

sentences.english: Reaching the number, he hurried up the steps and did not spare the bell in waking the servant.
sentences.chinese: 到了公寓，他急忙跨上臺階，照舊按鈴叫醒了女僕。

sentences.english: He had only time to creep into an alcove to avoid them.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙躲到一個小間裏來避開他們。

sentences.english: He jerked the fish out of the water.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙一抖把魚甩出水面。

sentences.english: Hewas rushed to the hospital and injected with Adrenalin.
sentences.chinese: 他被急忙送往醫院注射腎上腺素。

sentences.english: She hurried home and turned everything topsy-turvy to find the lives to save.
sentences.chinese: 餘老夫人急忙趕回家，翻箱倒櫃地找待救之物。

sentences.english: The teacher raced the wounded boy to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 老師急忙將受傷的男孩送往醫院。

definition: in a great rush/in a flurry
to be just about to/to be on the point of
to turn one's head/to turn around
